Package fi.tuni.tiko

Class AnswerBox

java.lang.Object
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Actor
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
fi.tuni.tiko.AnswerBox
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.utils.Cullable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnswerBoxMovable
public class AnswerBox
extends com.badlogic.gdx.scenes.scene2d.Group
AnswerBoxes are designed to be wide rectangles that contain some text. The text is a choice or tells how the feeling meters have changed.

  • Constructor Details

    • AnswerBox

      public AnswerBox​(java.lang.CharSequence text, float x, float y, float width, float height)
      Creates a new AnswerBox. An AnswerBox is comprised of a background image and a text box label to precisely control where the text can be.
      Parameters:
      text - the text in the text box
      x - horizontal coordinate in pixels
      y - vertical coordinate in pixels
      width - width of the background in pixels
      height - height of the background in pixels

  • Method Details

    • setBackground

      public void setBackground​(java.lang.String drawable)
      Sets the image used for the background of the box. The image is found in MySkin.
      Parameters:
      drawable - name of the image

    • setTextStyle

      public void setTextStyle​(java.lang.String style)
      Sets the style of the text in the box The style is found in MySkin.
      Parameters:
      style - name of the style
